data.oai_dc:dc: ProRail, the agency that manages rail infrastructure in the Netherlands, is responsible for the entire railway network: construction, maintenance, management and safety. The Dutch railway network encompasses 7,021 kilometres of tracks, 2,589 crossings, 4,500 kilometres of overhead lines, 7,071 switches and 404 stations.Dataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nlPositive observations without protocol.18,098 records (March 2018)
